meanings.definition: In a rectangular manner or shape.
meanings.sent1: The table was placed rectangularly in the corner of the room.
meanings.sent2: She folded the paper rectangularly before putting it in the envelope.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to fit itself rectangularly into the tiny box, looking quite silly.
meanings.sent4: The buildings were arranged rectangularly, creating a neat and organized cityscape.
meanings.sent5: The puzzle pieces interlocked rectangularly, forming a perfect picture.
